item.title: Learning Spring Boot: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description:
Learning Spring Boot: A Comprehensive Guide

Spring Boot is an open-source, opinionated, convention-over-configuration framework built on top of the Spring Framework. Its primary goal is to simplify the development of production-ready, stand-alone Spring applications with minimal configuration. It’s widely used for building microservices, RESTful APIs, and web applications due to its speed, ease of use, and powerful features.

Why Spring Boot?
